overview: Malaya, a dedicated daughter, pursuing her dreams and living the life her mother can afford to give. Just when the pandemic happened, everything in her life turned upside down, spiraling so fast that she couldn’t get hold of any of it. A promise was made, could Malaya fulfill her mother’s last wish or just let the waves of the past completely wash away her hopes and dreams for the future.
title: The Woman with the Urn
